# Ultima Online Scripts - Full Documentation

## Overview

Complete Ultima Online (UO) script repository with 770+ scripts across 13 major categories.

## Quick Navigation

- [Scripts by Category](#scripts-by-category)
- [Integration Map](#integration-map)
- [Resource Links](#resource-links)

## Scripts by Category

### Admin_Tools

**Total Scripts:** 28

**Example Scripts:**

- `AntiPK_Guard/`
- `AntiPK_System/`
- `AntiPage_System/`
- `Blacksmith_Fix/`

- `Travel_Moongate_v18/`
- ... and 37 more scripts

## Integration Map

Key system integrations across categories:

- **Housing** integrates with: Items_Equipment (furniture), Economy (house pricing)
- **NPCs** integrates with: Skills (trainers), Economy (vendors), Quests_Events (quest givers)
- **Quests_Events** integrates with: Items_Equipment (rewards), NPCs (quest givers)
- **Skills** integrates with: NPCs (trainers), Combat (melee/ranged), Magic_Spells (casting)
- **Travel_Teleportation** integrates with: NPCs (travel NPCs), Economy (travel costs)
- **Magic_Spells** integrates with: Skills (magery), Combat (spell effects)
- **Items_Equipment** integrates with: Economy (pricing), NPCs (vendors), Skills (crafting)

## Resource Links

- [Main Repository](https://github.com/kaktaknet/awesome-uo-scripts)
- [Sphere Server Documentation](http://www.spherecommunity.net/)
- [Ultima Online Lore](https://uo.com/)
